pkgmetadata.longdescription:
ot-sources is a kernel experimental patchset containing performance patches and encryption. Power users can choose either the BMQ, PDS, MuQSS CPU schedulers. The TRESOR patch provides increased mitigation from cold boot resistant attacks (only in the 4.14.x series). Compiler based optimizations are provided by GraySky patch and O3 patch.
Currently not updated: The amd-staging-drm-next patches provide increase compatibility and better support for with new hardware and features. The ROCk kernel driver will install the driver needed for the ROCm platform. ROCm requires PCIe 2.0.
